\section{Pixel Level Diagnostics}

\newcommand{\mrvalueunc}[1]{%
  \ifcsname #1\planet\targetTable\endcsname
  $\csname #1\planet\targetTable\endcsname{}
  \pm \csname #1Uncertainty\planet\targetTable\endcsname$%
  \else
  $N/A$%
  \fi
}%

\newcommand{\mrvalue}[1]{%
  \ifcsname #1\planet\targetTable\endcsname
  $\csname #1\planet\targetTable\endcsname$%
  \else
  $N/A$%
  \fi
}%

\newcommand{\mrpvalueunc}[1]{%
  \ifcsname #1\planet\endcsname
  $\csname #1\planet\endcsname{}
  \pm \csname #1Uncertainty\planet\endcsname$%
  \else
  $N/A$%
  \fi
}%

\newcommand{\mrpvalue}[1]{%
  \ifcsname #1\planet\endcsname
  $\csname #1\planet\endcsname$%
  \else
  $N/A$%
  \fi
}%

\newcommand{\mrpovalue}[1]{%
  \ifcsname #1\planet\endcsname
  $\csname #1\planet\endcsname$%
  \fi
}%

\newlength{\subplotwidth}
\setlength{\subplotwidth}{\pixelCorrelationFigureWidthPercent\textwidth}

      \ForEachX
          {,}
          {%
            \edef\targetTable{\thislevelitem}
            \fancyhead[R]{Target \keplerId{} / Planet Candidate
              \csname planet\planet \endcsname{} / Quarter \csname
              quarter\targetTable\endcsname{} / Target Table \csname
              targetTable\targetTable\endcsname}
            \edef\differenceImage{\csname differenceImage\planet\targetTable\endcsname}
            \ifthenelse{\equal{\differenceImage}{}}{%
              % No data available for this target table, skip quietly.
            }{%
              \includeSingleGraphics{\differenceImage}
              \clearpage
              \edef\pixelCorrelationStatistic{\csname pixelCorrelationStatistic\planet\targetTable\endcsname}
              \ifthenelse{\equal{\pixelCorrelationStatistic}{}}{%
                \begin{alltt}
                  The pixel correlation statistic plot is not
                  available for target \keplerId, planet candidate \csname
                  planet\planet\endcsname{}, in target table \csname
                  targetTable\targetTable\endcsname.\\
                \end{alltt}
              }{%
                \includeSingleGraphics[width=18cm]{\pixelCorrelationStatistic}
              }%
              \clearpage
              \begin{center}
                \large{\textbf{PRF Fit of the Difference Image}}
              \end{center}
              \newif\ifShowDifferenceImageCentroid
              \ifcsname outOfTransitImageCentroidRow\planet\targetTable\endcsname
              \ShowDifferenceImageCentroidtrue
              \fi
              \ifcsname diffImageCentroidRow\planet\targetTable\endcsname
              \ShowDifferenceImageCentroidtrue
              \fi
              \ifShowDifferenceImageCentroid
              \vspace{-\parskip}
              \begin{table}[htb!]
                \textbf{Offset from the PRF fit to the out of transit image}\\
                \rowcolors{2}{\lightRowColor}{\darkRowColor}
                \begin{tabular}{l r r l r r l}
                  \toprule
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Row}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Column}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Units}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{RA}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Dec}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Units}}\\
                  \midrule
                  Out of Transit Image Centroid
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlImageCentroidRow}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlImageCentroidColumn}
                  & pixels
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlImageCentroidRa}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlImageCentroidDec}
                  & hours/degrees \\
                  Difference Image Centroid
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidRow}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidColumn}
                  & pixels
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidRa}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidDec}
                  & hours/degrees \\
                  Offset
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsRow}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsColumn}
                  & pixels
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsRa}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsDec}
                  & arcseconds \\
                  Offset/$\sigma$
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsRowSigma}
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsColumnSigma}
                  &
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsRaSigma}
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsDecSigma}
                  & \\
                  \midrule
                  Offset Distance
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\darkRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsDistanceCcd}}
                  & pixels
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\darkRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalueunc{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsDistanceSky}}
                  & arcseconds \\
                  Offset Distance/$\sigma$
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\lightRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalue{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsDistanceCcdSigma}}
                  &
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\lightRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalue{diffImageCntlCentroidOffsetsDistanceSkySigma}}
                  & \\
                  \bottomrule
                \end{tabular}
              \end{table} 
              \begin{table}[htb!]
                \textbf{Offset from the KIC RA and Dec converted to
                  pixels via motion polynomials}\\
                \rowcolors{2}{\lightRowColor}{\darkRowColor}
                \begin{tabular}{l r r l r r l}
                  \toprule
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Row}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Column}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Units}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{RA}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Dec}}
                  & \multicolumn{1}{c}{\textbf{Units}}\\
                  \midrule
                  KIC Reference Centroid
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicReferenceCentroidRow}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicReferenceCentroidColumn}
                  & pixels
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicReferenceCentroidRa}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicReferenceCentroidDec}
                  & hours/degrees \\
                  Difference Image Centroid
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidRow}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidColumn}
                  & pixels
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidRa}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageCentroidDec}
                  & hours/degrees \\
                  Offset
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsRow}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsColumn}
                  & pixels
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsRa}
                  & \mrvalueunc{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsDec}
                  & arcseconds \\
                  Offset/$\sigma$
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsRowSigma}
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsColumnSigma}
                  &
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsRaSigma}
                  & \mrvalue{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsDecSigma}
                  & \\
                  \midrule
                  Offset Distance
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\darkRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalueunc{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsDistanceCcd}}
                  & pixels
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\darkRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalueunc{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsDistanceSky}}
                  & arcseconds \\
                  Offset Distance/$\sigma$
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\lightRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalue{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsDistanceCcdSigma}}
                  &
                  & \multicolumn{2}{>{\columncolor{\lightRowColor}}c}
                  {\mrvalue{diffImageKicCentroidOffsetsDistanceSkySigma}}
                  & \\
                  \bottomrule
                \end{tabular}
              \end{table}
              \else
              \begin{alltt}
                The out of transit image centroid and difference image
                centroid could not be calculated for target
                \keplerId,\\ planet candidate \csname
                planet\planet\endcsname{}, in target table \csname
                targetTable\targetTable\endcsname{}.\\
              \end{alltt}
              \fi
              \begin{center}
                \large{\textbf{PRF Fit of the Pixel Correlation
                    Image}}
              \end{center}
              \ifcsname corrImageCentroidRow\planet\targetTable\endcsname
              \vspace{-\parskip}
